location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains a letter from the Political Agent in Bahrain, Major Tom Hickinbotham to the Political Agency in Sharjah sent to report that since friendly relations between Bahrain and Qatar had been restored, it had been decided that Qatar should receive supplies via Bahrain.
